I can recommand the other way. But I want the guide to be straightforward. It's not good to have two ways to do something.
People can still have a look at the CDI guide to find the other way
As I understand it, the plugin is best as it will create the index at build time of the project, where the META-INF/beans.xml option will create it at build time of the project having the dependence (so if multiple project depends on it, it will be indexed multiple times).
Also, if a project depends on 10 projects, it will need to build 10 indexes ...
But I can change it to the other way, I just don't want to offers two options because the user will ask which one is the best ... so KISS and document only one in the getting started guide.
